data.event: After the closure of the tram system on 13 April 1969, the workshops continued to be used to service the City Council's bus fleet, until the workshop complex was shifted to Toowong in 1979.
After the closure of the tram system on 13 April 1969, the workshops continued to be used to service the City Council's bus fleet, until the workshop complex was shifted to Toowong in 1979.

event.title: the late 1980s, a change in City Council policy saw

data.event: However, in the late 1980s, a change in City Council policy saw the site sold for office development.
